description: Complementary pairs of graphs on n nodes. Also unlabeled graphs with n nodes and an even number of edges.
links: P. J. Cameron, Sequences realized by oligomorphic permutation groups, J. Integ. Seqs. Vol. 3 (2000), #00.1.5.
crossrefs: Average of A000088 and A000171, the latter interspersed with zeros.
Cf. A054960 for graphs with an odd number of edges.
author: _Peter J. Cameron_
extensions: Mathematica program modified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 08 2013
